page.title: 05MEDIA LOCAL NEWSPAPER
page.content: The Kibworth Chronicle is a community newspaper serving the Kibworth area and run by local volunteers.It was started in April 1978 by Mr D Taylor-Smith.It reports local news and discusses matters of local interest.It gives notice of forthcoming local events,it has a correspondence column and a junior page for children.Occasionally it features biographies of local personalities.It carries advertisement from local buisinesses and is illustrated with photographs.It is produced once a month and is distributed to Kibworth Beauchamp,Kibworth Harcourt,Smeeton Westerby,Gumley,Church Langton,East Langton,Sadington and Carlton Curlieu.Every month 2750 copies are printed and about 50 volunteer
